translations: 纯洁的，处女的；女灶神的

sentences.sentence: Vestal virgins. I can see them.
Thee Vestal Virgins lived at the Forum as well.
sentences.translation: [6]维斯塔贞女也居住在古罗马广场。

sentences.sentence: Vestal looked up to see Belfred crooking a finger from the half darkness of the hall.
sentences.translation: 薇思德一抬头，看见白菲瑞达在半明半暗的门厅里弯弯手指招她过去。
